name: Chordinate
techDescription: Desktop Application using JS (with jQuery) and CSS (with Sass).
description: This is an application shows a fretboard populated by all the notes in a given key.  It also highlights the fundamental intervals of a basic chord.  There is also the ability to change tunings while still showing all the notes of a scale. The aim of this application is to allow the user to visualise the fretboard so they can improvise freely while remaining in key

name: Hearing Loss Simulator
techDescription: Java Application using JSYN and Flash
description: This is an application I built for my masters thesis.  It is designed to simulate various degrees of hearing loss

name: People and Culture
description: This is a website for a Dublin based company specialising in buisiness and personal coaching
